attributes.action: Stop allowing banks to lend money that dont exist!
attributes.additional_details:
We all know the current collapse of the world’s economy and inflation has been caused by bankers.  The question you should ask is should banks be allowed to create money from thin air and lend that money out thousands of times?

This is like lending someone else’s 1oz of gold to 1000 people with just an IOU?  What if 5/1000 asked for the asset in physical? It’s illegal and needs to change!
